class4NicInfo.title: Included not-taxable profits
class4NicInfo.description: Income, receipts and other profits included in business income or expenses but not taxable as business profits

isExempt.title: isExempt
isExempt.description: True if the taxpayer is exempt from paying class 4 nics on this source of income; false otherwise

payVoluntaryClass2Nic.title: Pay voluntary Class 2 NIC
payVoluntaryClass2Nic.description: True if the taxpayer wants to make voluntary payments for class 2 nics on this source of income; false otherwise
